ModMetaData.name: Kenshi Armory (1.4)
ModMetaData.author: Geminingen
ModMetaData.description:
1.4 patch for Gemi ningen's Kenshi Armory mod. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2271106264
Bring various weapon and armor from world of Kenshi.
New Update: Mecenary plate and Tin Can added!
